game.name: Zork I: The Great Underground Empire (Release 2)
game.notes: Earliest known Zork release, from TRS-80 Model I copy-protected disk

results.notes: v1 engine executes but walkthrough incomplete (10%). Maze layout differs from v3 - needs v1-specific solution.

observations.troll_combat: Required 4 sword attacks to kill (vs 1 in r5, RNG-dependent)
observations.maze: Layout differs from v3 - standard navigation fails
observations.text: Same text and responses as r5
observations.scoring: Same scoring system as later versions
